plot: The plot of the short set in a landscape ravaged by a devastating war and has the characters Ruth and Rocco, two cripples who live isolated in the world and can not live without each other.
title: La uva
plot_es: The plot of the short set in a landscape ravaged by a devastating war and has the characters Ruth and Rocco, two cripples who live isolated in the world and can not live without each other.
plot_en: The plot of the short set in a landscape ravaged by a devastating war and has the characters Ruth and Rocco, two cripples who live isolated in the world and can not live without each other.
